result.name: assessment-reports-on-applications-for-veterinary-medicines
result.notes: Assessment reports for national Marketing Authorisation applications and applications dealt with under decentralised, mutual recognition, variations and renewal procdedures (For above data only UK's when we are the Reference Member State - i.e. country that leads on the assessment).

organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Assessment Reports on  applications for veterinary medicines

extras.value: The reports contain companies' confidental data so cannot be released. (However, see under 'What we publish already'  that we publish in UK Public Assessment Reports information derived from these reports).
